trans-unit.source: Lists ways to validate in username/password mode.
trans-unit.target: Lista as maneiras de validar no modo de nome de usuário/senha.

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is referenced by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.UserNameServiceElement>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ServiceCredentialsSecurityTokenManager>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential>.
trans-unit.target: Essa enumeração é referenciada por <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.UserNameServiceElement>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ServiceCredentialsSecurityTokenManager>, e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential>.

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to set this property.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo mostra como definir essa propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Custom authentication based on a configured custom <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator" />.
trans-unit.target: Autenticação personalizada com base em um <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator" /> personalizado configurado.

trans-unit.source: Provides password validation based on a configured <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider" />.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a validação de senha com base em um <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider" /> configurado.

trans-unit.source: Usernames are mapped to Windows users.
trans-unit.target: Nomes de usuário são mapeados para usuários do Windows.
